price: Bugün artık ne sizden, ne de kâfirlerden bir fidye alınır. Barınağınız ateştir. Size yaraşan odur. Ne kötü bir sonuç!
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma lā yu'khadhu minkum fid'yatun walā mina alladhīna kafarū mawākumu al-nāru hiya mawlākum wabi'sa al-maṣīru
